common.auto: This is an automated message. Please do not reply!
withdrawal_confirmation.title: Nami Exchange - Sell Order via Partner confirmation
withdrawal_confirmation.text_02: Someone has just made a sell order from your account ({email})
withdrawal_confirmation.text_06: Enter this 6-digits to verify that sell order
withdrawal_confirmation.text_07: If this action isn't yours, please update your password, check your login devices and contact us immediately at support@nami.exchange.
